ygData.subject: Comparing teams/characters
ygData.msgSnippet: How do we compare two characters? Suppose I had 2 elves.  1 elf holds more mana and generates mana faster than the other one while the 2nd elf has more armor.

How do we compare two characters?

Suppose I had 2 elves.  1 elf holds more=
 mana and generates mana
faster than the other one while the 2nd elf has mo=
re armor.  All other
factors are even.  Who wins?

I'd say the elf who can =
generate mana faster; at least that's been my
strategy.  Step 1 was always =
bring all the characters on my team to
the point where they can fire the ba=
sic attack non-stop *without*
running out of mana.  Once that was done, eve=
rything else fell in line.
